entry.def: If you say that someone looks presentable, you mean that they look fairly tidy or attractive.

example.ex: She managed to make herself presentable in time for work.
example.tran: 她想方设法让自己在工作时间穿得更像样。

entry.tran: 拿得出手的；像样的；令人满意的
entry.def: If you describe something as presentable, you mean that it is acceptable or quite good.

example.ex: His score of 29 had helped Leicestershire reach a presentable total...
example.tran: 他拿下29分，帮助莱斯特郡队获得了一个不错的总成绩。

example.ex: Sometimes when I performed in New Zealand, I was doing a very presentable job.
example.tran: 有时，在新西兰演出的时候，我表现得很出彩。
